title: The Bachelor's Abbie Chatfield shows off her incredible figure in a skimpy white bikini
text:
She was rejected by Matt Agnew on the season finale of The Bachelor, but single Abbie Chatfield is having the time of her life.

On Sunday, the 24-year-old hit the beach and showed off her incredible figure in a skimpy white bikini.

The reality star took to Instagram on Sunday to share two photos of her relaxed day out.

'Hot girl summer!' The Bachelor's Abbie Chatfield (pictured) showed off her incredible figure in a skimpy white bikini as she enjoyed a day at the beach on Sunday

Posing on the shore, the stunner wore a huge straw hat and appeared to go makeup-free.

She wore her blonde curls down around her shoulder, still damp from her swim.

Her high-cut bikini, from Lahana Swim, featured a ring detail at the centre of the top, and showcased the beauty's taut tummy and trim pins.

Abbie captioned the photos: 'Caption saying something about hot girl summer'.

Lovely: Her high-cut bikini, from Lahana Swim, showcased the beauty's taut tummy and trim pins. Posing on the shore, the stunner wore a huge straw hat and appeared to go makeup-free

Yummy! Later, she enjoyed a post-swim meal on a balcony, which consisted of cheese, crackers, meats and berries

Later, she enjoyed a post-swim meal on a balcony, which consisted of cheese, crackers, meats and berries.

She captioned that snap: 'Still going on about the friggin raspberry'.

On Saturday, Abbie didn't appear to have a care in the world as she partied with her pals.

Wow! On Saturday, Abbie didn't appear to have a care in the world as she partied with her pals. The blonde took to Instagram to share a photo of her eye-popping outfit

That is a look! The reality star put on a very busty display in an orange jumpsuit with a white floral pattern as she attended a house party with friends

The blonde who appeared to be at a house party, took to Instagram to share a photo of her eye-popping outfit.

The reality star put on a very busty display in an orange jumpsuit with a white floral pattern.

Most stunning however was the outfit's very low-cut v-neckline, which showcased the beauty's ample assets to great effect.

Abbie captioned the fun photo, in which she's crouched on wooden floorboards and sipping a drink from a red cup: 'Beer is better on the floor'.
description: She was rejected by Matt Agnew on the season finale of The Bachelor, but single Abbie Chatfield is having the time of her life.
authors: Marta Jary For Daily Mail Australia
